patterns: Tell me about your drinks menu.

responses: We offer a variety of drinks including espresso, cappuccino, latte, macchiato, Americano, and various tea options.

patterns: How much do your drinks cost?

responses: Our drink prices vary depending on the size and type of drink. On average, our espresso-based drinks range from $3 to $5, while our teas start at $2.50.

patterns: I have food allergies, what are my options?
responses: We take allergies seriously and provide allergen information for our menu items. Please ask our staff for assistance.

patterns: Are there any upcoming events at your coffee shop?

responses: We occasionally host events such as live music nights, open mic sessions, and art exhibitions. Stay updated by following our social media channels.

patterns: How can I contact customer service?

responses: For any inquiries or assistance, you can reach our customer service team at +1-800-123-4567 or email us at customerservice@coffeeshop.com. You can also visit our website for FAQs and contact forms.
Our friendly staff are always available to assist you. Feel free to ask for a manager during your visit or fill out our online feedback form on our website.

patterns: What sustainability initiatives do you have?

responses: We are committed to sustainability and implement practices such as using biodegradable cups and sourcing ethically sourced coffee beans.
Protecting the planet is important to us. Learn more about our sustainability initiatives, including waste reduction and energy-efficient operations.

patterns: Do you have any daily specials?
